statements: SELECT * FROM electric_bus_routing;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM electric_bus_routing ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT route_name, demand_score FROM electric_bus_routing WHERE demand_score > 50;
SELECT route_name, distance_km, demand_score FROM electric_bus_routing ORDER BY demand_score ASC, distance_km DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, demand_score FROM electric_bus_routing WHERE demand_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT * FROM electric_bus_routing ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, demand_score FROM electric_bus_routing WHERE distance_km > 10;
SELECT * FROM electric_bus_routing WHERE traffic_pattern LIKE '%heavy%';
SELECT route_id, route_name, demand_score FROM electric_bus_routing WHERE demand_score > 75 ORDER BY demand_score DESC;
SELECT MAX(demand_score) AS max_demand_score FROM electric_bus_routing;
SELECT * FROM ElectricBuses;
SELECT bus_name, current_location FROM ElectricBuses WHERE route_id = 12;
SELECT route_id, traffic_condition, timestamp FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bus_id, bus_name, current_location FROM ElectricBuses ORDER BY bus_name ASC;
SELECT pattern_id, traffic_condition FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE traffic_condition = 'Heavy traffic' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ElectricBuses WHERE route_id = 100 ORDER BY bus_id DESC;
SELECT bus_id, bus_name, route_id FROM ElectricBuses WHERE last_updated > '2022-05-01' AND route_id IN (50, 60) ORDER BY bus_name ASC;
SELECT bus_id, bus_name, current_location.STAsText() AS location FROM ElectricBuses WHERE STIntersects(current_location, 'POINT(37.7749 -122.4194)');
SELECT pattern_id, route_id, traffic_condition, timestamp FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-04-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_buses, route_id FROM ElectricBuses GROUP BY route_id HAVING total_buses > 10 ORDER BY total_buses DESC, route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM bus_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM bus_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT bus_route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM bus_routes WHERE bus_route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location FROM bus_routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_intensity > 50 ORDER BY traffic_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM bus_routes WHERE route_name='Route A';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM bus_routes WHERE start_location='City Center';
SELECT b.route_name, t.traffic_street, t.traffic_intensity FROM bus_routes b JOIN traffic_data t ON b.bus_route_id = t.bus_route_id WHERE t.traffic_intensity > 50;
SELECT b.route_name, bd.demand_date, bd.demand_count FROM bus_routes b JOIN bus_demand bd ON b.bus_route_id = bd.bus_route_id WHERE bd.demand_count > 100 ORDER BY bd.demand_date DESC;
SELECT b.route_name, bd.demand_date, bd.demand_count FROM bus_routes b JOIN bus_demand bd ON b.bus_route_id = bd.bus_route_id GROUP BY b.route_name HAVING SUM(bd.demand_count) > 500;
SELECT * FROM BusStops;
SELECT stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM BusStops ORDER BY stop_name ASC;
SELECT stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM BusStops WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM BusRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, congestion_index FROM TrafficPatterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM BusStops WHERE stop_id = 1;
SELECT stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM BusStops WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, stop_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM RouteSchedules WHERE departure_time >= '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-10-01 08:00:00' AND '2022-10-01 18:00:00';
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM BusRoutes WHERE end_stop_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM electric_bus_stops;
SELECT stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM electric_bus_stops;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM bus_routes;
SELECT pattern_id, route_id, time_of_day, traffic_level FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, route_id, date, demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE demand > 100;
SELECT * FROM electric_bus_stops;
SELECT stop_name, latitude, longitude FROM electric_bus_stops ORDER BY stop_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM bus_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT pattern_id, time_of_day, traffic_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_level = 'high';
SELECT forecast_id, route_id, date, demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
